messages.message: The game keeps freezing during my matches, and I can't finish them.
We're sorry to hear that. Could you please share your device details?
I'm using an iPhone 14 Pro with the latest iOS.
Thank you for the details. We'll escalate this to our technical team.
I accidentally purchased gems I didn't mean to buy. Can I get a refund?
Sure, we'll process your request. Can you provide the purchase receipt?
Here's the receipt: ABC12345.
Thanks for sharing. The refund has been processed. It should reflect in 3-5 business days.
The game won't connect when I'm on Wi-Fi, but it works fine on mobile data.
Can you check if your Wi-Fi has any firewall restrictions?
I don't think so. Other apps work fine on my Wi-Fi.
We'll run a few diagnostics on our servers. Please hold tight.
The treasure hunt event isn't tracking my progress correctly.
We're aware of this issue and are working on a fix. Thanks for your patience.
Any updates on the fix?
The issue has been resolved. Please restart the game to see the changes.

ticketSubject: Unable to log in with Google

messages.message: I can't log in with my Google account. It keeps saying 'authentication failed.'
Can you try clearing your cache and logging in again?
I tried that, but it's still not working.
We'll investigate this further. Can you confirm your Google account email?
It takes over 5 minutes to find a match every time I queue.
Could you share your region and rank? This will help us investigate.
I'm in Europe, and my rank is Platinum.
Thanks. We'll look into matchmaking times in your region.
After the latest update, all my progress is gone. Can you help?
Can you share your Player ID so we can restore your progress?
Sure, my Player ID is 123456789.
Thanks! We've restored your progress. Please check and confirm.
I didn't get my daily reward today even though I logged in.
We're sorry for the inconvenience. Did you encounter any error messages?
No error messages, just no rewards.
We'll look into your account logs to verify. Please hold on.
The game crashes every time I open it.
Can you try reinstalling the game and let us know if the issue persists?
I reinstalled it, and it's working now. Thanks!
My score isn't showing on the leaderboard after winning several matches.
Could you confirm the match IDs for your recent games?
Sure, here are the IDs: 789123, 789124, 789125.
Thanks. We'll verify these and get back to you soon.
My purchase seems to have stalled, and I haven't been charged yet.
Thank you for reporting the stalled transaction. Our team is looking into it.
I'm experiencing issues with a stalled purchase process.
Our team is currently checking why your purchase hasn't been completed.
I tried to buy an item, but the payment process seems frozen.
I need a refund for a recent accidental purchase.
Thank you for reaching out regarding your refund. Our team is reviewing your case.
I was charged for an in-app purchase I didn't want. Refund requested.
We apologize for the mistake. Your refund is being processed.
Requesting a refund for an unauthorized purchase.
Your refund request has been forwarded to our billing department.
I accidentally bought an item; please issue a refund.
I'm unable to update my game to the latest version.
We are aware of the update issue and are working on a fix.
The update process fails every time I try to download.
Your update problem is being investigated by our technical team.
I can't seem to install the new update; it just doesn't work.
We apologize for the inconvenience caused by the update failure.
Every attempt to update the game results in an error.
Could you clarify the rules for the special event?
We have updated the FAQ with detailed rules for the special event.
I need more information on how the special event works.
Please refer to the official guidelines for the special event on our website.
What are the guidelines for participating in the special event?
The rules for the special event have been clarified in our latest update.
I'm confused about the rules of the current event. Can you help?
Our team has provided a comprehensive breakdown of the event rules.
Thank you for the amazing work on the game!
We're glad you're enjoying the game, and we appreciate your feedback.
I appreciate the developers' effort in making this game enjoyable.
Thank you for your kind words. Our developers work hard to improve the game.
Kudos to the developers for the recent update.
It's great to hear that you appreciate our efforts. Thank you!
I noticed my order hasn't gone through. The transaction seems halted.
Our support team is on it. Please hold on as we resolve the issue with your purchase.
My payment is pending. The purchase process appears to be stalled.
Thank you for your patience. We are working on your purchase processing issue.
The in-game store is not processing my purchase properly.
Our team is checking the payment process to ensure your purchase is completed.

We apologize for the delay in processing your order. Our team is on it.

Your refund request is important to us. We are currently verifying your transaction.
